mbuild.formats package¶

Submodules¶

mbuild.formats.gromacs module¶

mbuild.formats.gromacs.save_gromacs(traj, step=-1, basename='mbuild', forcefield='opls-aa')[source]¶

Output a Trajectory as a GROMACS .gro and .top file.

mbuild.formats.hoomdxml module¶

mbuild.formats.lammps module¶

mbuild.formats.lammps_data module¶

mbuild.formats.mol2 module¶

mbuild.formats.mol2.save_mol2(traj, step=-1, filename='mbuild.mol2')[source]¶

Output a Trajectory as a TRIPOS mol2 file.

Parameters:
  • traj (md.Trajectory) – The Trajectory to be output.
  • filename (str, optional) – Path of the output file.
